successes.title: The Cyanide & Happiness Show
successes.description: An independent Cyanide & Happiness show, broadcast straight to the Internet.

Pledges.description: A special thanks on our website, periodic email updates and the satisfaction of helping make our show a reality.
SEASON PASS: You get an account to an exclusive part of our website where you can download each video DRM-free, look at behind the scenes content and more.
BUCKET OF STUFF: Includes the Season Pass, DVD or Blu-ray of the season (to be made 1-3 months after the final episode), full of bonus content, a backer exclusive sticker pack.
BIG OL BUCKET: Season Pass, the DVD or Blu-ray, backer sticker pack, plus an exclusive backer t-shirt.

DELUXE DONOR PACKAGE: Season Pass, DVD or Blu-ray, backer stickers and t-shirt, plus a Kickstarter exclusive poster autographed by all four Cyanide & Happiness guys. We'll also sign your DVD / Blu-ray, while we're at it!
DVD FRIENDS WITH BENEFITS: You get the above Deluxe Donor Package, plus your name on a Special Thanks insert in the DVD case, along with everyone who pledged $150 and up.
Get one of the drawings created during the final 3 hour Draw-A-Thon of the Kickstarter! Also includes the Deluxe Donor Package.
ONE AND ONLY MEDAL: The Deluxe Donor Package, plus a personalized certificate and limited edition Cyanide and Happiness Kickstarter medal, personalized to you and framed.
SUPER COLLECTOR'S PACKAGE: The Deluxe Donor Package, plus a piece of original artwork taken straight from one of our pre-production sketchbooks, mounted, personalized to you, framed and autographed.
NIFTY FIFTY: The Super Collector's Package, plus a personalized trophy featuring an etched C&H character to show the world how awesome you are. Only fifty of them will ever be made.
BECOME A C&H CHARACTER: The Super Collector's Package, plus an original 9" by 6" oil painting on panel board by one of the show's artists, depicting you as a Cyanide & Happiness character.

FRIENDS LIKE THESE: The Super Collector's Package, plus one of the Cyanide & Happiness guys will create an original 6-panel comic about you and your friends, and send you a digital copy as well as five signed physical ones.
A Producer credit at the end of each episode. You also get the Super Collector's Package.
DRAWN AND QUARTERED: You will forever be immortalized as you are drawn into a sketch on the show and be ridiculed/defiled. Includes Super Collector's Package.
FLY HARD: We'll fly you to Dallas for two days to visit our studio and guest voice act for an episode. USA only, unless travel is arranged separately. Includes Super Collector Package.

KING BANANA: We'll fly you and a friend (within US) to Dallas for the Banana Bar Crawl (April 13, 2013) and put you in a hotel near the event. You will be given a banana costume, a crown, scepter and "royal throne" . Your personal paige will announce you at every bar and take care of your drinks. And a surprise or two. Includes Super Collector's Package.

LEARNING GOOD: One or two of the C&H guys will fly to your university (nag your student body organization about this one), show some of our animations and/or works in progress and do an hour long Q&A about it. USA only. University is responsible for its own audio/video setup.
